title: YouTube : all-time beauty content category views 2017
yAxis: Amount of category views in billions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount of category views in billions for 9 number of Selected Cosmeticss.
The Amount of category views in billions is highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
There is a difference of 215.0 between the maximum Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and minimum Selected Cosmetics Nails.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount of category views in billions for 9 number of Selected Cosmeticss.
The Amount of category views in billions is highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount of category views in billions for 9 number of Selected Cosmeticss.
The Amount of category views in billions is highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
There is a difference of 215.0 between the maximum Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and minimum Selected Cosmetics Nails.
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Selected Cosmetics, and Amount of category views in billions in each Selected Cosmetics on the y axis.
The Amount of category views in billions is appeared to be the highest at Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall and lowest at Selected Cosmetics Nails.
The difference of Amount of category views in billions between the highest and lowest Selected Cosmetics is 215.0.
The Selected Cosmetics Beauty - overall has the highest Amount of category views in billions, followed by Cosmetics, and Hair. Down to the Selected Cosmetics Nails which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Amount of category views in billions in all 9 Selected Cosmeticss is roughly 69.33.
Summing up the values of all Selected Cosmeticss, we get total 624.0.
